title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 5, pt. 395 - Military Service Benefits
content:

State Regulations
§ 395.1 - Responsibilities relating to military service benefits
§ 395.2 - Effect of veterans' benefits on eligibility for public assistance and care
§ 395.3 - Persons in military service-eligibility of dependents
§ 395.4 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 5, pt. 395

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
